Articles.Content:
Hi Fellow Kerbinites

Just wanted to introduce myself as seems the polite thing to do as some of you will be answering my steady stream of pointless questions.

I hope to seee you out there.

Psi

Welcome to the community Psifroto

There's lots of helpful people here, so ask away

Hullo! Welcome to the forums Psi!

As for pointless questions, that a bit of an oxymoron around here. any question you have people will be willing to answer, or direct you to an answer. Like me for example, i would be happy to answer any and all questions you have that i am able to.
Thank you gentlemen I will be annoying you soon!
